data.oai_dc:dc: Binary alignment map (BAM) file for 16 Gopherus polyphemus samples for the publication: Elbers, J.P., R.W. Clostio, and S.S. Taylor (2016) Population genetic inferences using immune gene SNPs mirror patterns inferred by microsatellites. Molecular Ecology Resources. For detailed steps on how this file was created see: https://github.com/jelber2/immunome_2014/blob/master/README.md
